entry.summary:

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,335Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: Whatever Our Souls Are Made Of, His and Mine Are the Same
entry.summary:
Author: Gojos_Robin

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,166Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 105

Summary: “So much for escaping Crime Alley” I thought to myself while walking to my MMA class, when I thought I saw a familiar face pass me by. “Was that Jason?” I asked myself. Turning around, I could only see the back of a tall man, taller than me even, around six foot four, but built like a brick shit house. Without a thought I yelled out. “Jason?”The one where Jason Todd and Y/N see each other again after a decade.

entry.title: Bloodied Roses
entry.summary:
Author: Maaaak95

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,525Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Jason Todd doesn't believe in he can have romance in his bitter existence, he's like a joke with a never ending punchline. All he's good for is pain, the kind he pushes upon himself and the criminals of Gotham. Until he stumbled upon a small flower shop, but it wasn't the perfect roses, or the sweet orchids; no, not even those damn sunflowers that were so pristinely taken care of.It was you. The thing that grabbed his attention -leaving him like a deer caught in headlights- was you, the florist that's smile could put the sun to shame.But he was Jason, a man with blood on his hand, and he'd be damned if he tainted you, the one person who looked too pure for the smog filled skies of Gotham City. Yet, he couldn't stop the way his heart yearned to bask in your glowing presence.
